actions.text: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 206 (Roll no. 263).

description: Amendment prohibits the Bureau of Indian Affairs from transferring any land into tribal trust unless the recipient tribe enters into a binding agreement with State and local governments regarding the collection and payment of sales and excise taxes generated on such land.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 17 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996 to prohibit any new transfer of federal lands into tribal trust unless the recipient tribe enters into a binding agreement regarding state and local sales taxes on sales to non-natives on new indian trust properties.
